languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Бичевание{/g} (5): противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Этот штраф суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: Castigating 5: Enemies targeted by the Navigator powers gain a −5 penalty to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This penalty stacks and is renewed every time the same enemy becomes the target of the Navigator powers. +5 Willpower +5 Perception

{g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} (5): Feinde, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erleiden bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Abzug ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Geißelnd{/g} 5: Gegner, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −5 auf alle ihre Eigenschaften. Dieser Abzug wird jedes Mal aufaddiert und erneuert, wenn derselbe Gegner das Ziel der Kräfte des Navigators wird. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} (5) : une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −5 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Fustigation{/g} (5) : une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −5 s'applique à toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} des ennemis ciblés par les pouvoirs du navigateur jusqu'à la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Cette pénalité est cumulable, et à chaque cumul, elle est prolongée jusqu'au tour suivant du navigateur. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}（5）：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}降低5点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}惩戒{/g}5：所有被导航者能力影响的敌人，所有属性降低5点，效果持续至导航者下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}{/g}此效果攻击相同敌人时可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会相应延长。 +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +5{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

This penalty stacks and is renewed every time the same enemy becomes the target of the Navigator powers. +5 Willpower +5 Perception

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} (5): Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −5 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se prolonga hasta el próximo turno del navegante cada vez que se aplica. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigo{/g} 5: Los enemigos objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −5 a todas sus características hasta el final del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del navegante. Esta penalización se acumula y se renueva cada vez que el mismo enemigo es objetivo de un poder del navegante. +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +5 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Истязание{/g} 5: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Когда целью становится тот же самый противник, штраф суммируется, а его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

{g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Истязание{/g} 5: противники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −5 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} навигатора. Когда целью становится тот же самый противник, штраф суммируется, а его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +5 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}非難{/g}（5）：航宙士の力の標的となった敵は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して-5の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。このペナルティは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+5増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+5増加
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Castigating{/g} (5): enemies targeted by Navigator powers suffer a −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 非難{g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}{/g}5：航宙士の力の標的となった敵は航宙士の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時まで全ての能力に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}−5が付与される。このペナルティは累積し、同じ敵が航宙士の力の標的となるたびに更新される。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が5増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が5増加

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Castigating}Kırbaçlayıcı{/g} (5): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı düşmanlar, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} −5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonuna dek sürer. Bu ceza puanı üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}

This penalty stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +5 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
